title: Honeywell Considers Walking Away From Johnson Matthey Catalyst Deal
description: Honeywell International Inc. is considering walking away from its acquisition of Johnson Matthey Plc’s Catalyst Technologies business, people familiar with the matter said.
content: Honeywell International Inc. is considering walking away from its acquisition of Johnson Matthey Plc’s Catalyst Technologies business, people familiar with the matter said.
